_comment: This file is the authoritative source of truth for task execution state. The markdown plan file is read-only reference documentation. Use status-cli.js to update task status.
planName: Implementation Plan: Git Workflow Phase 1 - Core Branching

tasks.description: Read current `/plan:set` command and understand its workflow
tasks.notes: Documented current workflow, identified git insertion points

tasks.description: Add git branch check: does `plan/{plan-name}` exist?
tasks.notes: Added section 3.0.2 for git branch existence check and switch logic

tasks.description: If branch doesn't exist, create it: `git checkout -b plan/{plan-name}`
tasks.notes: Branch creation already implemented in section 3.0.2 - 'If branch does NOT exist: Create new branch: git checkout -b plan/{plan-name}'

tasks.description: If branch exists, switch to it: `git checkout plan/{plan-name}`
tasks.notes: Branch switch logic already implemented in set.md section 3.0.2 - 'If branch exists: Switch to branch: git checkout plan/{plan-name}'

tasks.description: Add uncommitted changes detection before branch switch
tasks.notes: Added section 3.0.1 for uncommitted changes detection before branch switch

tasks.description: Present options when uncommitted changes exist: Commit, Stash, Cancel
tasks.notes: Added section 3.0.3 with Commit/Stash/Cancel options for uncommitted changes

tasks.description: Record branch name in status.json metadata
tasks.notes: Added section 3.0.4 for recording branch name and branchCreatedAt in status.json metadata

tasks.description: Add branch validation at start of `/plan:implement`
tasks.notes: Added section 1.1 Git Branch Validation to implement.md with git availability check, branch validation logic, and backwards compatibility handling

tasks.description: Check if currently on expected `plan/{plan-name}` branch
tasks.notes: Already implemented in section 1.1 Git Branch Validation - Step 2 gets current branch with git branch --show-current and derives expected branch from plan name, Step 3 validates and takes appropriate action

tasks.description: If on wrong branch, warn user and offer to switch
tasks.notes: All 6 verification tests passed. Branch validation, commit format, and git availability checks all working correctly.

tasks.description: If not on any plan branch, warn but allow continue (backwards compat)
tasks.notes: Already implemented in section 1.1 as 'Backwards compatibility mode (non-plan branch)' - warns user but continues with task implementation when on non-plan branch like master or feature branches

tasks.description: Update the existing commit step to include plan/phase in commit body
tasks.notes: Already implemented in section 6.1 Commit Changes After Task Completion - commit body includes Plan: {plan-name}, Phase: {phase-number} - {phase-name}, and Task: {task-id} using heredoc format

tasks.description: Create git utility functions documentation in status-tracking.md
tasks.notes: Created git-utilities.md with getCurrentBranch(), isOnPlanBranch(), getPlanBranchName() patterns and comprehensive documentation

tasks.description: Document `getCurrentBranch()` pattern (use `git branch --show-current`)
tasks.notes: getCurrentBranch() pattern already documented in git-utilities.md at lines 43-65 with git branch --show-current, usage example, and return value docs

tasks.description: Document `isOnPlanBranch()` pattern (check prefix `plan/`)
tasks.notes: isOnPlanBranch() pattern documented in git-utilities.md - checks if branch starts with 'plan/' prefix using bash pattern matching

tasks.description: Document `getPlanBranchName(planName)` pattern
tasks.notes: getPlanBranchName(planName) pattern documented in git-utilities.md - converts plan path to 'plan/{plan-name}' format by extracting basename and removing .md extension

tasks.description: Document `hasUncommittedChanges()` pattern (use `git status --porcelain`)
tasks.notes: Added hasUncommittedChanges() pattern to git-utilities.md with function definition, usage examples, inline pattern, file count pattern, and notes about git status --porcelain behavior

tasks.description: Update `/plan:status` to show current git branch
tasks.notes: Added git branch display to /plan:status, documented current status-cli.js output format

tasks.description: Show uncommitted changes count in status output
tasks.notes: Added commitCount to getGitInfo() and display in all output formats (text, JSON, markers)

tasks.description: Show commit count for current plan branch
tasks.notes: Added commit count to git info section in /plan:status output

tasks.description: Show last commit SHA and message (abbreviated)
tasks.notes: Added getGitInfo() helper function with lastCommit SHA and message

tasks.description: Add git info to `node scripts/status-cli.js progress` output
tasks.notes: Added git info to all progress output formats (text, JSON, markers)

tasks.description: Test full workflow: set plan → implement tasks → verify commits exist
tasks.notes: Created integration test suite with 9 tests, all PASS

tasks.description: Test branch switching between plans
tasks.notes: Branch switching works correctly with independent commits

tasks.description: Test uncommitted changes handling
tasks.notes: Uncommitted changes detection and stash functionality verified

tasks.description: Test backwards compatibility (running without git or outside repo)
tasks.notes: Backwards compatibility verified - git info gracefully omitted when unavailable
